All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AirConditioner
Represents an air conditioner device.
AirConditionerCommand
Base class for commands that operate on an AirConditioner device.
AmazonMusicApp
Represents the Amazon Music app for the smart speaker.
BaseCamera
 
BaseSpeaker
Represents a base speaker device that can be controlled to play, pause, stop, and adjust the volume.
Camera
Abstract class representing a camera device.
CameraCommand
 
CameraDecorator
Abstract class representing a camera decorator.
CaptureImage
Command to capture an image from the camera.
ClosedState
 
Command
Command is the common interface for every command of the system.
CommandFactory
the CommandFactory class is based on the "Factory Method" design pattern by the GoF.
CommandRegister
CommandRegister class is used to list available commands for each device.
DecoratorFactory
the DecoratorFactory class is based on the "Factory Method" design pattern by the GoF.
Device
Device is the common interface for every smart device of the system.
DeviceCommand
 
DeviceFactory
the DeviceFactory class is based on the "Factory Method" design pattern by the GoF.
Door
Represents a door device that can be opened, closed, locked, and unlocked.
DoorCommand
 
Environment
the Environment class simulates a virtual environment for the SmartHomeController devices to react to.
Event
Instances of the Event class describes a sequence of commands that are executed under certain conditions of the system.
EventManager
EventManager is a class that encapsulates the logic behind creating events.
GUIPrinter
GUIPrinter is the class responsible of printing the user interface for the entire software.
GUIWindow
GUIWindow is a simple graphical user interface for the Smart Home Menu Interface.
HDAudio
A class representing a high-definition audio enhancement for a camera.
Light
Represents a light device that can be turned on and off.
LightCommand
 
LockCommand
 
LockedState
 
LockState
 
NightVision
A class representing a night vision enhancement for a camera.
ObservableDevice
the Observable abstract class is the base of every device of the system that can be "observed" by the SmartHomeController.
Observer
Interface for the class implementing the "Observer" design pattern.
OffState
 
OldHeater
Represents an old heater device that can be turned on or off.
OldHeaterAdapter
Adapter class for the OldHeater device.
OnState
 
OpenedState
 
PauseCommand
 
PauseState
 
PlayCommand
 
PlayState
SpeakerState is the base interface for all the play-states subclasses, which are used inside the "speaker" device.
PowerState
PowerState is the base interface for all the states subclasses.
RecordVideo
 
Scenario
Scenario is a class that offers a way to encapsulate a list of commands that the system can execute (all together or in different scheduled times) in any given moment.
Scenario.ScheduledCommand
 
SetLowerBoundCommand
 
SetTargetTemperatureCommand
Command to set the target temperature of the air conditioner.
SetUpperBoundCommand
 
SetVolumeCommand
 
SmartHomeController
 
Speaker
Abstract class representing a speaker device.
SpeakerAppDecorator
Decorator for speaker devices.
SpeakerCommand
 
SpeakerState
Interface representing the state of a speaker.
SpotifyApp
Represents the Spotify app for the smart speaker.
StopCommand
 
StopState
 
SwitchLightCommand
 
ThermalVision
A class representing a thermal vision enhancement for a camera.
Thermostat
Represents a thermostat device that measures temperature and notifies observer (i.e. controller) when the temperature goes beyond set bounds.
ThermostatCommand
 
TurnOffCommand
 
TurnOnCommand
 
UnlockCommand
 
UserFacade
UserFacade is a class based on the Facade Design Patterns.
YoutubeMusicApp
Represents the YouTube Music app for the smart speaker.
